script: Devi stands center-frame, wearing an elegant nightshirt, gazing at her reflection.
With a clean jump cut, her outfit transforms into an exquisite evening gown.
Devi slowly turns once to showcase the new look.
She poses confidently, highlighting the elegance of both outfits.
Devi walks calmly out of frame, leaving a lingering impression.
